website_summaries.verdict: This spacious habitat is particularly well loved by rat and chinchilla owners for its chew-proof construction, but it works just as well for degus, sugar gliders, or even a single hedgehog.
pros: Solid metal ledges and ramps are chew-proof and easy on feet
Tight 3/8-inch wire spacing keeps escape artists contained
Wind bell lock provides additional security
Roomy with plenty of vertical space for climbing and jumping
Bottom shelf provides storage for food, treats, bedding, and toys
cons: Cage floor made of wire, but this is easily remedied by adding a layer of cardboard or even removing the base entirely

customer_reviews.title: Best cage for chinchillas.
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased this cage for my chinchilla about 7 years ago. It lasted forever. I only got rid of it because I thought it would be nice to have something bigger for him. Last year I purchased a cage that was by the same company and was marketed for chinchilla's and ferrets. It, however, was not comparable to this cage. The shelves and ramps were plastic so my chinchilla ate through them. I decided to get this one again and, as before, has proven perfect and indestructible!
customer_reviews.author: Kim F.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for one chinchilla
customer_reviews.text: This cage is the perfect size for our classroom pet! It's large enough to give plenty of room for exercise, but still compact enough to fit in a busy classroom. It is sturdy, and was fairly simple to put together. It has a pull-out tray for easy cleaning and a rack on the bottom that provides extra storage. The door is large and easy to open and latch -- I don't have to worry about our critter pushing it open from the inside because the door didn't close all the way. When I priced cages in local pet stores, they were not only smaller, but more expensive. I'm very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Erlenbush

customer_reviews.title: Great product for all our animals
customer_reviews.text: We have four of these cages. They no longer sell them at our pet store and fortunately Amazon did. Their pretty easy to put together, came with easy to understand instructions and L wrench. The cages do from time to time need to be retightend and sometimes the metal shelves fit rather snuggly. But, they’ve worked wonderfully for our various different animals. Their sturdy, except at times tightening, no sharp metal pieces and the bars are descently spaced. However, be careful with the bars and bending. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Easy to build and didn’t need extra tools
customer_reviews.text: Great cage. I was worried about putting it together because I’m pretty inept at such things, plus I don’t have tools. But it came a little tool for doing the screws and it was very simple and easy. It took me maybe an hour, but I’m very fastidious and slow/careful. It’s bigger than I thought it would be, but the bars are tight so I don’t think it’ll be a problem. I have two small girl rats. Directions of pieces and pieces themselves aren’t clearly labeled, so it took a while to figure out if I had the right sides, but I got everything right and had no occurances of a Do Over.
customer_reviews.author: MIke

customer_reviews.title: Best chinchilla cage on the market!
customer_reviews.text: Really great chinchilla cage. Probably the best and cheapest one on the market! I have two of them and will be getting a third soon and i swear by them! Theyre really great! Very sturdy, easy to clean, fairly easy to assemble. Theres just one tiny flaw on the bottom wire part where it can slide out if the chinchilla jumps around REALLY hard (which they do!) But was easily fixed with just a little metal clip i bought at Wal-Mart for $1.
customer_reviews.author: Savannah Woolley

customer_reviews.title: the bars are flimsy
customer_reviews.text: I love the cage, especially the size since I have a small apartment and a critter nation was just tooooo big, but am giving it 3 stars due to the very thin and flimsy bars. They came bent and some broken. my 1 rat found one of the broken ones and squeezed right thru it. The main frame of it is sturdy enough. but I Wouldn't recommend it for anything bigger than a chinchilla. The platforms are narrow. its ideal for my rats and anything smaller due to the bar spacing being so narrow, when they aren't broken or bent.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Urine collects on floor. Don’t buy.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this cage for 2 rats. The cage is built great and looks great but it is awful when it comes to the rat urine. The urine runs down the side of the cage and collects down the side and in the caster wheels. The design in that respect is awful. So there is always urine on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. B

customer_reviews.title: Best Cage Ever !!
customer_reviews.text: The best cage I’ve ever had for sturdiness, ease of cleaning, and design. Its 100% metal besides the pull out tray which makes it easy to clean the stink off (I have pet rats in it), unlike critter nation no porous plastic that gets nasty after some time. This thing will hold up for years. I’ve had mine for 1.5 years now and it’s still in perfect condition. The ramps and shelves are sheet metal not bars- so better for the little animals’ feet. It’s amazing. Get this cage!! You’ll save $100 too compared to similar sized, lesser quality competitors.
customer_reviews.author: lasroka

customer_reviews.title: Great rat cage
customer_reviews.text: I had absolutely no problem putting this cage together with my 8 yr. old granddaughter. The only thing she had to do was balance to opposite side for me as I put it together. It’s a nice looking, very sturdy, and easy to clean cage. The door is big enough to get in there to clean, or put in or take out any accessories you might want to, but not so big that you you can’t control the entry point. I do wish they would make one just like it but without the legs to stack on top, so I could have a big cage for a nursery.
customer_reviews.author: muleladycm

customer_reviews.title: Needed help with setup
customer_reviews.text: The cage was hard to put together alone. Its a good amount of space, cheaper than Critter Nation. I have a 6 month old rescue rat who seems to like it. Its certainly better than the tank the pet store had her in. It is noisy in my bedroom at night, but I saved her from being snake food so its worth it. She needed lots of space because she does not like petting or chlling out on the bed like my other rat did. Im satisfied with the purchase. It is darker in color than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: TheSwanSong

customer_reviews.title: 2x buyer
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our Chinchilla. I ordered it twice, the first time I received a used and dirty cage and returned the very next day it was received. Re-ordered a second time and it was a new cage. Only reason I give 4 stars it’s because of the first time receiving a used cage. Other than that I just replaced the old cage my chinchilla had for the same one as is spacious and easy to clean. The first cage we had for 6 years, only reason I bought a new one was because we move States.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: My rats are so happy with this cage, they are much more active in it and can’t escape due to the distance between bars. It’s very easy to assemble. The couple of problems I have with it are there are no locks on the wheels so my dog can push it around which is a little irritating. And the grate goes on top of the tray which isn’t good for rats because they like to burrow in bedding and it isn’t as stable with just the tray. I’m a little worried about them figuring out how to escape from the bottom. There is only one lock for the tray thing and there should be more.
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and spacious
customer_reviews.text: So I’m really pleased with how this cage turned out. I was able to put it together in under an hour. A few spots had bent bars which I’ve included in my pictures and there were also 2 holes drilled into the wrong side. Other than that there were no issues and those were very minor issues anyway, I was still able to put it together with no issues and the bent bars weren’t much of an issue because the bar spacing is so tight to begin with that my rats won’t be able to get out anyway. This cage will allow enough room for about 3-4 adult rats.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cage 4 months ago for my two Fancy Rats, it could have used better instructions for assembling. It was a nice size for my rats, however not even 6 months old and on of the welds on the bottom has broken, the others are starting to rust as well, it only a matter of time before I will have to replace. Considering the cost of this cage I expected much better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Harli

customer_reviews.title: Happy Hamster
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I was hoping for. It's sturdy, the bars are close enough that he can't get out, and for a hamster it's very spacious. It did come with instructions but it was a bit of a pain, it took me 1.5 hours to put together but that being said I'm not a very logic-minded person, so it might just be me. Two of the bars were slightly bent, I just bent them back into place. It's much better than his last cage and he seems to really like it so far. My cat really liked this cage as well, she kept trying to hop in. Pet approved!
customer_reviews.author: Mica Rue

customer_reviews.title: Happy rat girls!
customer_reviews.text: My 3 rats seem pretty happy with their new digs. Transferred from a 50 gallon tank to the cage. They love the different levels and the toys that I can hang in the cage that they couldn't have in the glass tank. Its pretty easy to clean. The only wish that I would have is that the plastic drawer could be metal, so that i can take out the wire bottom and prevent escapes. Rats chew plastic pretty easily. Rat happiness overall.
customer_reviews.author: AZGypsyGirl

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to assemble. Very roomy for our furry one.
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this cage, easy to put together. Easy to roll from space to space. It took us about an hour to put together in total. Our little Hamster loves his new space, freedom and lots of room to roam. A beautiful cage for us to view as well. Thank you so much. 5 Stars all the way. I stand by this choice in a small pet cage. Much appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Lucinda M Lickver

customer_reviews.title: Buy a cage that has a couple doors bc cleaning is so often.
customer_reviews.text: I am a first time rat owner. I bought this cage after reading many reviews about this and some others. Though it is an alright cage, my number one complaint and regret is that it is so incredibly hard to clean out. The small door on the front makes it hard to clean the inside and makes it hard to take out and reinstall the levels when it is time to clean. We have 4 rats and so it should be cleaned every 2-3 days at the very least. If I was to do it all over again, I would have chosen a cage and that has doors that fully open like the Critter Nation cages.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Shepard

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Condo for our Rat.
customer_reviews.text: Just received this, my 14 year old daughter put it together in just over 35 minutes. full instructions were in the box, tray slides out just fine. Literally none of the issues many others have mentioned. This is perfect and very roomy. Our male ratty LOVES his new space and I think we can now get him a friend. There is plenty of room. Great product, we are very happy with this.
customer_reviews.author: Krissy

customer_reviews.title: This is a great cage, excellent for rats.
customer_reviews.text: This cage is amazing. Everyone who sees it calls it our Rat Mansion. It is big. It is sturdy. It is VERY easy to assemble, and it has wheels to make it VERY easy to move! The ramps are very well-constructed and it is not too difficult to clean. We also attach several hammocks and toys to the sides and it supports everything. One of the best features is the shelf underneath--didn't think we would use it much.... but we sure do! Very happy with this purchase. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Don W.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, less chinchilla mess, great price
customer_reviews.text: We bought the cage for 2 male chinchillas. We have used both homemade cages and store bought cages. This cage is solid, non chewable, notice less dropping mess and so far escape resistant. One of the boys is really good at escaping, and since they spend part of the year in a classroom, escape resistant is vital for the custodians sanity. The boys seem happier, we are very pleased with the quality of the cage and are ordering another one for our female chinchilla.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: I have issues with this cage
customer_reviews.text: I have had this since April of this year(2020) and it is October now (2020) and the cage door broke on the left hand side on the bottom which is shown in the picture. I now have to figure out how to keep that side tight enough so my 4 rats don't escape. They will be able to push that corner out and wreck havoc. I also am going to have to be able to open it to feed them. It's not very easy to deep clean either. The wheels don't always work either. I'm going to be looking for a new cage again after spending the $120 on this one. Not very happy right now.
customer_reviews.author: keri

customer_reviews.title: 4 stars!!!
customer_reviews.text: Came a day early which is a plus. Took about 45 minutes to an hour to assemble which isn’t bad ! Only reason why I’m giving 4 stars is because the tray was damaged. Other than that, great cage.
customer_reviews.author: Nadia

customer_reviews.title: 100% Recommend
customer_reviews.text: For $120, I absolutely love this cage. I've owed rats in the past, and have been through my fair share of cages. This is a very nice cage that's a little of the cheaper side, but still has ample space for the little ones to run around. It comfortably fits 2 to 3 rats, and still has space to hang hammocks and toys. Took about an hour to put together by myself and went together rather nicely. I personally didn't find the instructions difficult, but I also like building things like that. I would say cage spacing is probably good for young rats, just not little baby ones. 100% recommend
customer_reviews.author: Meghan Johnston

customer_reviews.title: 2 stars
customer_reviews.text: Like most complaints on this product - multiple flimsy bent bars out of box. I've had a few break already as well. I don't think my baby chin is capable of such destruction. Setup was actually very basic and product looks good if you don't inspect too closely. Slide out tray was also warped like others mentioned. Hard to recommend.
customer_reviews.author: WOLFSSLAYER

customer_reviews.title: Could have put better wheels on it.
customer_reviews.text: Great cage. Solid build. Sturdy. Weakness: cheap ass plastic wheels. Broke two of them trying to push them into their holes. Bought some metal ones and now it's everything I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Sequoya's Garden

customer_reviews.title: A Home for Axl, Sue Sue and Brick
customer_reviews.text: Our rats love their new home. I bought three rats for my sons birthday and we needed a cage that could handle them all. This seems to be working great. The cage was very easy to put together but there were a couple of areas where the bars were bent but I was easily able to squeeze them back into place. I find the cage very easy to clean, It rolls around nicely and Axl, Sue Sue and Brick are safe and secure in their new home!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Fontenot

customer_reviews.title: This is the second one we've bought, because the last one lasted 9 years!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our chinchilla 9 years ago, and it was wonderful! When we were in the market for a new home for our "Minnie", we bought another one, knowing it would be the last one we'd need to buy. It is very sturdy and perfect for our chinchilla. If you keep it clean, it will last for longer than your pet does. :) Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great for our prairie dog
customer_reviews.text: We are very happy with this purchase. We use this for our pet prairie dog. The spacing on the bars, and the construction of them eliminated the problem we had with the previous cage where she was chewing the bars and rubbed the fur off of her nose. We wish the bottom tray were deeper there; the wood shavings don't stay in there as well. The bars are very thin, and one bent then snapped off when we tried to bend it back.
customer_reviews.author: Dedicated Amazon Fan

customer_reviews.title: Fairly easy and done in less than an hour
customer_reviews.text: I put this together with my child. Fairly easy and done in less than an hour. Nice size for 2 rats. Bars nice and close together. Have to put a floor in - just a wire floor so we stuck plastic place mats together and covered them with with low pile fleece.
customer_reviews.author: Cal

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Cage
customer_reviews.text: We've been looking for awhile for a new cage for our two rats and just never really liked anything that we saw until this cage. I spent several days reading reviews on this cage and my husband and I decided to get this one. Are we glad that we did!!! Assembly was okay. I just wish that the pictures on the instructions were bigger to see better. You won't regret getting this cage for your little critters. Our little rats love their new cage.
customer_reviews.author: Drie

customer_reviews.title: Great cage for a chinchilla!
customer_reviews.text: There are wires on the walking surface. There is a poop tray. Mine was slightly damaged but usable. The wires are very narrow making a handing water container a little more difficult to use. There is a ton of space!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Mann

customer_reviews.title: Bent badly and not "rose gold"
customer_reviews.text: So, every single panel had badly bent wires. Bent so badly in fact, that when you took a needle nose to bend them back, the actual length of the wire is too long and not tight and firm like the ones on either side of it. Then, the panels themselves were bent, like it was forced into the packaging or something. It's too bad, It's not cheap and the color is really chocolate metallic brown not rose gold. It rated in the top 5 of rodent cages. I will save up for a Martin's cage and the high shipping rate.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Harris

customer_reviews.title: Great Rat cage
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our pet rat. It’s really cute, and I love that it’s easy to clean and move around with attached wheels. Nice large size. Bars are small so your critter can’t escape. Made of metal, so they can’t chew through.
customer_reviews.author: C. Read

customer_reviews.title: I love this cage
customer_reviews.text: I love this cage! I have a pair of ratties and it works great. The only thing I don't like about it, is the wires on the ramps. I understand they're for traction, but a rat doesn't need traction and little bits of bedding get stuck under the wires and it's a pain to clean. Also, I removed the wire bottom, so that I would put bedding in the bottom, plastic tray.
customer_reviews.author: A Good Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Rat House
customer_reviews.text: Good quality cage that comes exactly as described and is fairly easy to assemble. I did NOT order this for the unique color (it was just the best fit, so we were willing to live with the color) but the rose does not really stand out much and I find that it blends in quite well with the cage's surroundings. Some of the bars were a little off - as in, not perfectly straight/even - but considering my two rats just poop and pee all over this thing, it isn't a huge deal. I find this to be a very satisfactory purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Price

customer_reviews.title: Okay quality, but not perfect
customer_reviews.text: I found it fairly easy to assemble with the instructions provided (pay attention to the details of the pictures). My only complaint is that all of the pieces don’t fit together perfectly, leaving a gap on the bottom level. (One of the pieces was a couple cm too short, for example.)
customer_reviews.author: David L.

customer_reviews.title: A nicer, but affordable option.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Prevue rat and chinchilla cage as it was one of the nicer and more affordable options. I found it to be fairly sturdy, chew proof, easy to clean and convenient, especially with it being on rollers. However, it should be noted the wheel casters do not lock and several of the wires were bent/out of place, upon arrival. Not enough that I felt it would affect the health and safety of my rat family, but something to keep in mind. With that being said, I was satisfied enough to order another for my ever growing rat colony.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Great cage for 2 rats!
customer_reviews.text: This cage is easy to assemble and quite sturdy. The wheels are great as I like to move the rats from place to place sometimes. Latch is secure and easy to use, my kids can easily open and close the cage. I wish the plastic tray fit a bit more snugly to the bottom as I don't like to use the bottom grate because of their tiny feet. But small bungee cord makes me feel better about it. Each level is easy to wipe down and the ramps are easy to remove for cleaning. Great cage!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Ward Lowther

customer_reviews.title: Has a wire bottom, no good on pets feet all the time.
customer_reviews.text: I dislike this cage because the wire bottom and when you fill the tray with bedding it gets all over the floor. I have to put something on top of the wire floor so my raties are not always walking on the wire as it is bad for any animals feet to be on i t all the time. Wished I would of thought of this stuff before buying it
customer_reviews.author: Nudders

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for your chin to chill
customer_reviews.text: My chin absolutely loves this cage, am planning to go bigger wish this came in a bigger size
customer_reviews.author: Megan Miller

customer_reviews.title: I always read reviews first.
customer_reviews.text: So I need to get 2 rats for my Zoology program to train and I have been looking at cages for a while trying to find something I feel comfortable getting with the size and price and bar size all meeting certain standards I have. I had a cat (picture 3) so it’s been worrying me but I read reviews on this cage about bars being bent, and parts difficult to assemble, and it not being what people expected. But I am completely satisfied with this cage and there are no bent bars. I’m happy I got this cage, my cat enjoys it too. Can’t wait to get my rats.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bars are too flimsy, often come bent out of shape
customer_reviews.text: I did not keep this cage. I originally purchased it for my rats but when I opened it and started laying out the pieces to put it together, 3 of the panels had major bending between the bars which while easily fixed (with my fingers!), my rats couldn’t easily forced their heads through and gotten stuck and that’s not a risk I was willing to take. The cage itself is heavy but the bars are WAY too flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Libby Teague

customer_reviews.title: Cage has a lot of space so that is good. It is a little flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Cage has a lot of space so that is good. It is a little flimsy. Easy to put together. Plastic tray for bottom of cage came cracked on both ends and the bars above the door and on two other panels were really bent. It arrived quickly. I put cardboard on the bottom floor to help prevent my rats from hurting their feet on the bottom of the cage otherwise the bar spacing on the main part of the cage is good. Having it on wheels is good, makes it nice for moving around.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Olson

customer_reviews.title: This cage is perfect for my two degu
customer_reviews.text: This cage is perfect for my two degu. The all-metal design proves to be chew proof, and degu (like chinchillas, rats, rabbits) love to chew on everything. They love to run up and down the ramps, and there is plenty of room for extra accessories, like hay tunnels and sleepers. I would recommend this cage for any rodent, but would be too small for rabbits or ferrets. Very simple to put together and the price is great. Don't be fooled by the cheaper, plastic cages - they won't last long and your pet could chew the plastic which can be harmful.
customer_reviews.author: cat

customer_reviews.title: One screw hole was not thread-able. Used a drill.
customer_reviews.text: love this cage and I'm so happy with the price! Mine was not bent or damaged. But one side of the rail was not thread able... We used a drill it get it together. Happy! Please purchase if you're thinking about it. Mine is used for 4 male rats and is the perfect size. (Rat cage calculator said for up to 7 rats! But I don't plan to have more than 4 ever haha.)
customer_reviews.author: Koko

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't pick this cage again if I knew....
customer_reviews.text: The size and durability are great. Cleaning it is difficult. It also makes a big mess on floor outside of cage. I even put plexy glass on the lower sides and the shavings still come out all over.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L DeLabio

customer_reviews.title: Good cage but delivery company will wreck this thing.
customer_reviews.text: It was originally delivered with broken rungs.Delivery company was not nice to this box. Amazon shipped out another which also had broken parts. Out of the 2, I made a good cage and shipped back the broken parts. I don't like how the floor is just wire rungs. I cant put bedding in there because it falls to the tray. Overfill it and you can't pull the tray out. So I cover the bottom slide out floor panel with some old fabric and slide back in. My rats are litter box trained so I don't have to worry about poops getting caught in bottom tray and they have happy feet.
customer_reviews.author: K.&M.Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: I love this cage
customer_reviews.text: I love this cage, very easy to put together I did it by myself. Plenty of room for my two dumbo rats and they love their new home. I'm going to buy two more for my guinea pigs. I love that it is all metal even the ramps are and all I did was got some little rubber mats for the floor and they are good to go.
customer_reviews.author: Vickie D. Fuller

customer_reviews.title: My Rats Love It
customer_reviews.text: This cage is great for my 2 rats. They have plenty of room and it was easy to assemble. I could probably get 2 more rats and there would still be plenty of room. The cage is simple and easy to clean. One issue that i've had is i'm not a fan of how deep the litter pan is away from the bottom of the cage. If I don't want my rats to walk directly on the bottom bars I have to fill the litter pan up about 2 1/2 inch deep.
customer_reviews.author: Topher Harris

customer_reviews.title: Used to be good... is crap now.
customer_reviews.text: I was given my first Prevue cage for Xmas over 4 years ago, and just recently a coupe of bars broke due completely to how my chinchilla uses his cage. I bought one and the first piece I took out had broken bars, so I did an exchange. With 2 boxes of the same cage I didn't have enough good parts to build a single cage. The parts were not aligning or were bent. DO NOT BUY THIS CAGE the quality is very low now.
customer_reviews.author: Christie

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: Very good condition and size for the price. My 3 rats fit happily. Only thing cleaning wise is the shelves aren’t wired so you’d have to take them out to clean them. There’s a dish to slide out for the shavings and under that there’s a shelf to put bags of food. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jalynn 🌼

customer_reviews.title: Best cage ever
customer_reviews.text: I house two female rats in this and it is perfect. They love it! There is so much space for toys and hammocks and many other things. It is very easy to clean with the pull out tray. The door is perfect size to reach in and clean everything. And the set up is fairly simple. I overall love this cage and so do my babies! Would purchase again if I decided to get more! Love this cage. 100% reccomend for any critter ranging from rats to ferrets. It is very big and cozy for them!
customer_reviews.author: Caliegh

customer_reviews.title: it looks exactly like the picture and my rats love it
customer_reviews.text: Some parts did not fit exactly where they were suppose to, but with a little bit of elbow grease, it looks exactly like the picture and my rats love it. The only problem is that the material it is made of is beginning to erode away so I have to clean up the debris or else my room will smell like metal
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Karydas

customer_reviews.title: Check the bars upon arrival
customer_reviews.text: I've had this cage for my rats for just under a year now, and so far it's served its purpose. When the package arrived, some of the bars were broken off and warped; an issue if you have small rats as they can escape. The placement of the cage door makes it awkward to clean and hang hammocks and toys, but it's spacious and allows my rats ample running room. Overall I'm satisfied, and my rats are happy.
customer_reviews.author: Melody Edwards

customer_reviews.title: It arrived damaged!
customer_reviews.text: The cage wires arrived damaged. There were holes so big I had to fix them, because my two pet rats could have escaped!!
customer_reviews.author: Kendall Sue

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in good condition (aside from a few bent bars) and was super easy to assemble, took no time at all. My ratties love the new cage and all the extra space to move and climb around in, It was well worth the buy.
customer_reviews.author: Salina

customer_reviews.title: An affordable option but not without flaws.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Affordable Roomy Customizable Great customer care Easy assembly Cons: Cheap machining Plastic base Tray Requires extra work to clean Requires some "customizing" to avoid bumblefoot
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Deep pan!
customer_reviews.text: 3 stars because of that darn tiny door! The door made it hard to clean But everything else was just fine for 4 baby rats. Super cute and the color is nice. Wheels were also a plus. Thank goodness it had a deep pan also
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: perfect amount of space for my 2 rat boys
customer_reviews.text: perfect amount of space for my 2 rat boys, and grids are pretty tiny so if you had a hamster/mouse in here they wouldn't be able to escape. It's also suuper easy to clean with the removable tray!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great cage! I’d definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and very secure. I love that my chinchilla cannot be a Houdini from this cage. He loves jumping around from landing to landing and using the ramps too.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Baker

customer_reviews.title: Nice and big
customer_reviews.text: Nice and big, plenty of room, but pulling out the tray to clean it is a mess. The little "lock" at the bottom won't stay up when you want to pull the tray out so it gets caught. It's a real pain. It should be designed better. Also, rats like to nest and they push litter up against the bottom sides which makes a huge mess. Some kind of guard around the bottom would be nice.
customer_reviews.author: Caster Blaster

customer_reviews.title: Cage
customer_reviews.text: Our Guinea Pigs love this cage. Easy to put together well built instructions are good. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Karen S. Babst

customer_reviews.title: We just received Critter Cage model #495 via Amazon and ...
customer_reviews.text: We just received Critter Cage model #495 via Amazon and we're very dissatisfied with the product. 1st, Part B1: The screw hole has no threading, making it not possible for the screw to stay put, and keep it attached to the CB panel. (this part is the bottom rack holding the wheels ) 2nd, Part B1: The welding on the corners of B1 prevent the side rails L1 and R1 from completely aligning with the screw hole, making it impossible to enter the screw to secure them in place. Amazon, Thank you so much for processing our refund smoothly without giving me any grief over the matter.
customer_reviews.author: Karene  M Busby

customer_reviews.title: Good buy, is as described.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived as described, easy to assemble (even with the help of a couple of rats), sturdy and durable. Houses six rats comfortably. Large front door helps make up for lack of top access when cleaning shelves, hanging hammocks and installing other accoutrements plus its design helps prevent accidental smashing of lil fingers and toes. Ramps are easily removed for cleaning. If you are surprised upon receiving this product it is because you didn't read the description.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy J. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: Im planning on buying another this is a great cage for chinchillas.
customer_reviews.author: R.neal

customer_reviews.title: Great cage for the money
customer_reviews.text: Cage has performed well for 6 months now, good quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: J. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Clean
customer_reviews.text: This cage is hard to put together but is absolutely perfect when done. Very easy to clean and the chinchilla loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a wonderful cage for my chinchillas but I would like to ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful cage for my chinchillas but I would like to point out that the metal ramps were not made very well or with the animal in mind. The metal ramps had very sharp pieces of metal on the grooves, I filed them down and they are fine now but MAKE SURE YOU CHECK THEM or your animal can get cut. Other than that, the cage is very sturdy, I've had it for a couple of months and it's not rusting yet! It is pretty loud since it is metal on metal, but it is way better than the plastic ramps that they chew up!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly K.

customer_reviews.title: Great cage
customer_reviews.text: This cage is super great for a chinchilla! It's easy to put together and is pretty sturdy. Its hard to find metal cages that are well made and not super expensive or huge. I wouldn't recommend it for more than one chinchilla, though, unless they are both relatively on the small side for a chinchilla.
customer_reviews.author: Ella

customer_reviews.title: I really like this cage - I am able to house both ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like this cage - I am able to house both chins together and it is so easy to clean! It is a little noisy with all the metal but well worth it so they can't destroy it. My only concern was that my plastic pan for the litter was broken in the corner and I never received a reply from anyone. We had to duct tape the corner on. With the amount I spent, they should've sent a replacement! Great product - just be careful who you buy from...
customer_reviews.author: Jennd

customer_reviews.title: Overall a good cage for chinchilla
customer_reviews.text: The ramps and cage is completely metal aside from the tray underneath it. The cage seems to be perfect for the chinchilla. Have had no major issues and it has wheels for easy transport. We keep all his supplies at the bottom. It's a good starter cage.
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Arrived w/ some broken pieces
customer_reviews.text: I just received this product today. It was incredibly easy to put together. It is the perfect size for our three rats. So far my only complaint is that the little square black pieces that hold the wheels in place arrived broken so I can not attach the wheels. I reached out to the company so I am hoping they can send replacements.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: It is very roomie
customer_reviews.text: I love the cage but my rat got cut with the sharp edges around the door. I fixed it by rapping yarn around the sharp edges. If i can i would let the company know they got a great cage but need to refine the edges of the cage where the door opens.
customer_reviews.author: Becky Rardin

customer_reviews.title: Cant beat it
customer_reviews.text: Input it together by myself in under an hour. It’s a great size cage. Better than any cage I’ve bought from big box store.
customer_reviews.author: E.Odom

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a small rodent
customer_reviews.text: We rescued a baby squirrel. This cage works GREAT! We were worried about the bars being too far apart, but they aren't. They are about the same distance apart as a hamster cage. He loves his new, bigger house:). The quality of the construction is also great!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Baker

customer_reviews.title: Rat mansion
customer_reviews.text: Our girls love their new mansion :) We have 2 females in it, and they love climbing and running around from story to story. We have a little blanket on the bottom for them to lay on, and they moved it into their house. Love this cage. Very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Chassidy Garner

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit together well at all.
customer_reviews.text: We spent hours trying to get this cage together. And were so invested time wise and didn't think we could get it all to fit back into the box so we didn't return it. We used other hardware and got it together. If it actually fit together properly it would be a really great cage but it's horribly done, it's a frustrating hassle that nobody needs. Very disappointed and I think with the time and effort we put into this we could have built a better cage ourselves.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Rats Love It
customer_reviews.text: I have two rats. This cage was relatively easy to install. I gave sturdiness 4/5 because one of the door hinges broke off after 1 month. Beyond that, no complaints and seems large enough for my two male rats to hang out in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Take the plunge!
customer_reviews.text: I was scared of all the negative reviews but I went for it anyways. Box arrived undamaged, was so easy to set up, has so much room for my 2 boys and I love it. Might be noisy in a bedroom but these guys stay in my home office so it's no problem for me.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Not well made
customer_reviews.text: We went to assemble it and the legs were bent, had to re bend them without breaking the weld. Then when we went to put the sides up we notice there were bent wires, it looked terrible and I was concerned my sons baby rat would get out. What a mess!! I would not recommend this cage. The bars are very weak. Now it is assembled and sitting in a corner. I bet I couldn't sell it for $40.00
customer_reviews.author: S. Oak

customer_reviews.title: The bar spacing
customer_reviews.text: The bar spacing is awesome. I have two rats that get out of EVERYTHING and they cant now. mawhaha :p
customer_reviews.author: Satya Fedorowsky

customer_reviews.title: One of the few great cages for rats
customer_reviews.text: Great enclosure, and a great price. My only issue was the wire bottom on my rats paws. However, I easily modified the cage to use the plastic tray bottom, without using the wired bottom. Cage has been great for 2 female rats from 4 weeks old, till now (1.5 years). Great value, and promotes humane living conditions
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It didn't have all of the features that I would have liked, especially the horizontal bars
customer_reviews.text: Despite some of the negative reviews I took a chance on this cage. It didn't have all of the features that I would have liked, especially the horizontal bars, but for the price I'm totally satisfied! Putting it together was a breeze with two people and its totally customizable with fun ropes and hammocks. A few of the bars were a bit bent, but nothing that would allow for escape and they were easy to queeze back into place. All in all we're very happy with the cage and it was a major upgrade from their last one!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wrong description
customer_reviews.text: Product is not as advertised. I specifically purchased this one due to the 2 door openings... One on front and one on top. Unfortunately after partial assembly it was clear that there is NOT a opening on top of cage as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Coleegirl

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: We have had many rats in our lives but these two are by far the luckiest. When I purchased this cage I wasn't sure that it was worth the cost but I have been proven wrong. This cage is excellent- easy to clean, comfortable for the rats, easy to access the rats and to provide food. I just can't say enough about how great this cage is for our very friendly and funny rattie friends.
customer_reviews.author: Pipperz

customer_reviews.title: Great Ferret Cage
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cage to downsize for my one ferret. He had a large 5 story cage that he never utilized so I bought this one. It is very easy to put together, very sturdy and well made. It is very easy to clean. He loves it and I do too. It also has a nice finish so it doesn't clash too much with your decor. I would recommend this cage if you have one ferret only.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Courtade

customer_reviews.title: Multi-use even wildlife rehab
customer_reviews.text: Makes a great intermediate cage for my wildlife/possum baby rehab
customer_reviews.author: Tina Neff-Legg

customer_reviews.title: Great for rats
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this cage! Very easy to put together, nice and sturdy, easy to clean and the bars have perfect spacing for rats!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Cotton

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Very cheaply made cage. Came damaged with bent bars and scratches. If you're looking for a cage invest in a Critter Nation. Also it's very easy for rats to escape this cage and I would assume that would be the same for any animal kept in this cage.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Applegate

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: My chinchilla loves this cage. He moved from a smaller one with two levels to this "palace." He has room to run and jump. It was easy to assemble...from unpack to full assembly was about 20 minutes. The cage is strong, and the opening large enough to reach all points inside.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Easy to Assemble
customer_reviews.text: This is the easiest piece of "furniture" I've ever assembled! Super sturdy and easy to maintain. The perfect size for one chinchilla.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn M. Woodrum

customer_reviews.title: Best option
customer_reviews.text: Broken twice out of the box. Somewhat confusing assembly. But once its up my 3 girls could not be happier. And so so easy to clean!!
customer_reviews.author: Erin Lipski

customer_reviews.title: Good deal.
customer_reviews.text: A few of the welds were broken, zip ties fixed that though. I have five rats in mine. They didn't like the metal grate, but if you remove it and place the bedding pan in its place it works well. Great deal, Petco wanted $210. Easy to clean. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Ben O.

customer_reviews.title: Bent bars
customer_reviews.text: I like the cage overall. I just assembled it. I used zip ties on bars that we're bent and felt super week. Instructions were super easy. Tho on one spot a whole bent bar came off. It will do it's job for my rats
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Smith

customer_reviews.title: Rusted quick.
customer_reviews.text: I used this cage for my rats perfect in size. Just rusted very quickly, and the paint chipped off quick. Once put together, very hard to get the shelves out to clean. Made it difficult to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Include Instructions to put together
customer_reviews.text: Cage is okay, the shelves fall because they don't hook together well. The cage came with NO INSTRUCTIONS to put it together. Had to go online and search for instructions on how to put it together.
customer_reviews.author: Joalcom

customer_reviews.title: MY Chinchilla's new home
customer_reviews.text: this cage is perfect for our chinchilla - there is plenty of room for her to jump around and play. Very easy to clean and refill water and food. Very happy with this purchase. Set up was a little confusing at first but once I laid out all of the pieces and identified where each piece went - it was then easy to assemble
customer_reviews.author: michael j.

customer_reviews.title: it is a good product, possible to assemble and large enough for ...
customer_reviews.text: it is a good product, possible to assemble and large enough for the three rats I purchased it for. It did come bent, and it is difficult to line up all the bar connections.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Chase

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put up and it's a good size a large rat. I took the bottom wire rack off and slid the plastic tray in the slot, so that he doesn't have a trouble with his feet.
customer_reviews.author: Mashi

product_meta.title: Prevue Rat and Chinchilla Cage 495 Earthtone Dusted Rose, 31 x 20.5 x 40 IN
product_meta.description: Prevue Pet Products Rat and Chinchilla Cage is available in an "Earthtone Dusted Rose" hammertone finish. The small wire spacing and solid metal ramps and platforms make this an ideal cage for rats and chinchillas, as well as baby ferrets. The large front door allows for easy access to your furry friends while a pull-out bottom grille and tray make cleaning quick and easy. The wind-bell lock, on the bottom of the cage, prevents pets from pushing out the tray if the cage is used without the grille. This practical design also includes a bottom shelf for storing extra food, treats and supplies. Our Rat and Chinchilla Cage measures 31-inch long by 20-1/2-inch wide by 40-inch high with 3/8-inch wire spacing. Front door size is 13-inch by 13-inch.
feature_bullets: Ideal cage for rats, chinchillas and/or baby ferrets
Solid metal ramps and platforms are designed to withstand years of use
Wind-bell lock provides extra protection against escaping pets
Space saving shelf can be used to store toys, treats and more
31-Inch long, 20-1/2-inch wide, 40-inch high with 3/8-inch wire spacing

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
